item.title: Hazardous canisters dumped, 18th January
item.description:
I noticed 4 large nitrous oxide cylinders on Tillingbourne Green, Lee Green end plus 2 more canisters across the Green if you were walking towards the Swings. Obviously hazardous waste left close to the School. With thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tillingbourne Green, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light went out at approximately 9 pm Sunday evening., 18th January
item.description:
This lamp post is close to the junction with Stafford Road. It makes it very dark at the junction when driving along Stafford Road and going into Clifton Road. This will be dangerous for any one crossing the junction at night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clifton Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SORN car dumped in front of Maxwell House on Barnfield Estate, 18th January
item.description:
Photos taken 18th January 2026 ; SORN car dumped on public road on the Barnfield Estate in front of Maxwell House. Area is notorious for abandoned cars. Who is doing this?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barnfield Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car with no MOT and front license plate dumped on Barnfield Estate near Maxwell House, 18th January
item.description:
Just in front of the Maxwell House 1-6 entrance there’s an abandoned Alfa Romeo that’s got no MOT and no license plate in the front. Area is notorious for abandoned cars. Photos taken 18th January 2026

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Barnfield Road, Plumstead

item.title: Blocked drain., 18th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Maple Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Spa Beckham Car Park, 18th January
item.description:
The lighting situation at The Spa at Beckenham / Venue 28 car park is unacceptable. As you can see in these photos, large areas are completely unlit. ​This is a high-traffic area with kids constantly coming and going for swimming and gym classes. Walking to the Pay by RingGo carpark or the entrance feels genuinely unsafe right now, especially with the wet ground hiding trip hazards. ​Let’s get this fixed before someone gets seriously hurt!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Turners Meadow Way, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Lane, Blendon, Greater London
